205.MESSAGE: It's time to treat your hives
205.SUBJECT: Oxalic acid treatment

303.MESSAGE: The gain of your bees' stock exceeds
303.SUBJECT: Significant provision of resources

304.MESSAGE: The loss of your bees' stock exceeds
304.SUBJECT: Resource depletion

311.MESSAGE: Incoming weight during the last week exceeding
311.SUBJECT: Honeydew

312.MESSAGE: The weight of your hive exceeds
312.SUBJECT: Weight limit exceeded

404.MESSAGE: Data transmission error from your weather station
404.SUBJECT: Weather station stopped

405.MESSAGE: The weight of your hive is abnormally low
405.SUBJECT: Stolen hive

406.MESSAGE: Your hive has been detected dead
406.SUBJECT: Dead hive

DCONNECT_HUB.TITLE: {apiaryName} - Hub disconnected
DCONNECT_HUB.MESSAGE: The Hub ({deviceName}) seems to be disconnected since {localDate}.
DCONNECT_HUB.SUB_MESSAGE: Following devices will not send their data: {devices}.

HUB_DISCONNECTED.TITLE: {apiaryName} - Hub disconnected
HUB_DISCONNECTED.MESSAGE: The Hub ({deviceName}) seems to be disconnected since {localDate}.
HUB_DISCONNECTED.SUB_MESSAGE: Following devices will not send their data: {devices}.

DCONNECT.TITLE: {hiveName} - Device disconnected
DCONNECT.MESSAGE: '{hivePosition}' no longer transmits data following the shutdown of its sensor ({deviceName}) from {localDate}.

DEVICE_DISCONNECTED.TITLE: {hiveName} - Device disconnected
DEVICE_DISCONNECTED.MESSAGE: '{hivePosition}' no longer transmits data following the shutdown of its sensor ({deviceName}) from {localDate}.

POORSIGNAL.TITLE: {hiveName} - Poor device signal
POORSIGNAL.MESSAGE: Loss of data on '{hivePosition}! Only {value}% of the expected readings has been received today. The sensor signal ({deviceName}) may be the cause.

DEVICE_POORSIGNAL.TITLE: {hiveName} - Poor device signal
DEVICE_POORSIGNAL.MESSAGE: Loss of data on '{hivePosition}! Only {value}% of the expected readings has been received today. The sensor signal ({deviceName}) may be the cause.

CALIBRATION_FINISHED.TITLE: {apiaryName} - Phenological model calibrated
CALIBRATION_FINISHED.MESSAGE:
{plantName} has a phenological model based on {nbOBS} observations.
The start of flowering is estimated at {bloomingDate}.

INCOMING_PHENOSTAGE.TITLE: {apiaryName} - Predicted Phenological Stage
INCOMING_PHENOSTAGE.MESSAGE: We predict that {plantName} will rich the 'PHENOSTAGE' stage in {preventDays} days ({bloomingDate}).
INCOMING_PHENOSTAGE.SUB_MESSAGE_MODEL: Would you like to validate this stage when it happens?
INCOMING_PHENOSTAGE.SUB_MESSAGE_NO_MODEL: Would you like to check for it?

ENHANCE_FLOWERING.TITLE: {apiaryName} - Enhance Your Flowering Predictions
ENHANCE_FLOWERING.MESSAGE:
{plantName} is estimated to flower within 3 weeks (around {bloomingDate}).
Bud burst should occur soon.
Would you like to check for it?

ENROLLMENT_PLANT.TITLE: {apiaryName} - Add a plant to your apiary?
ENROLLMENT_PLANT.MESSAGE: We've detected a nectar flow. Would you like to add a plant to your apiary?

ENROLLMENT_OBSERVATION.TITLE: {apiaryName} - Add an observation to your apiary?
ENROLLMENT_OBSERVATION.MESSAGE: We've detected a nectar flow probably related to a plant in your apiary. Would you like to add an observation?

NECTAR_FLOW_ONSET.TITLE: {hiveName} - Nectar Flow start
NECTAR_FLOW_ONSET.MESSAGE: A nectar flow has started for the hive {hiveName}.

NECTAR_FLOW_STOP.TITLE: {hiveName} - Nectar Flow stop
NECTAR_FLOW_STOP.MESSAGE: The nectar flow for the hive {hiveName} is finished.

NECTAR_FLOW_RESTART.TITLE: {hiveName} - Nectar Flow restart
NECTAR_FLOW_RESTART.MESSAGE: The nectar flow for the hive {hiveName} has restarted.
